org.jamwiki.model.Category

  • Packages that use Category 
    Package Description
    org.jamwiki.db
    Provides classes needed for all database interaction.

      Return a List of all Category objects for a given virtual wiki.

      Retrieve a list of all topics in a category.
      List<Category> AnsiQueryHandler.lookupCategoryTopics(int virtualWikiId, String virtualWikiName, String categoryName) 
      List<Category> AnsiDataHandler.lookupCategoryTopics(String virtualWiki, String categoryName)
      Retrieve a List of Category objects corresponding to all topics that belong to the category, sorted by either the topic name, or category sort key (if specified).
